description: Manage variables in a variable group.

commands.name: az pipelines variable-group variable create
commands.summary: Add a variable to a variable group.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable-group variable create --group-id
                                            --name
                                            [--detect {false, true}]
                                            [--org]
                                            [--project]
                                            [--secret {false, true}]
                                            [--value]

commands.name: az pipelines variable-group variable delete
commands.summary: Delete a variable from variable group.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable-group variable delete --group-id
                                            --name
                                            [--detect {false, true}]
                                            [--org]
                                            [--project]
                                            [--yes]

commands.name: az pipelines variable-group variable list
commands.summary: List the variables in a variable group.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable-group variable list --group-id
                                          [--detect {false, true}]
                                          [--org]
                                          [--project]

commands.name: az pipelines variable-group variable update
commands.summary: Update a variable in a variable group.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable-group variable update --group-id
                                            --name
                                            [--detect {false, true}]
                                            [--new-name]
                                            [--org]
                                            [--project]
                                            [--prompt-value {false, true}]
                                            [--secret {false, true}]
                                            [--value]
